snippet: The Treasury Department imposed targeted sanctions on seven officials and eight companies, creating an early test for the incoming Trump administration....
abstract: Treasury Dept imposes sanctions on 15 Russian individuals and companies for their involvement in occupation of Crimea and Ukraine; move sets up early test for Pres-elect Donald Trump, who is widely expected to ease pressure campaign against Russia.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department imposed targeted sanctions on seven officials and eight companies, creating an early test for the incoming Trump administration.

headline.main: U.S. Blacklists 15 Russian Entities Linked to Ukraine and Crimea
headline.print_headline: U.S. Imposes Sanctions on 15 Russian Entities
